channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: In Retirement, There's Finally Time to Cherish the Past
item.description: A trip to a childhood home. Boxes of old letters. A storage room filled with artificats from long ago. The memories they evoke have never felt so dear...

item.title: Ether trails bitcoin and solana in 2024. What that means for crypto portfolios.
item.description: Ether has significantly underperformed other major cryptocurrencies such as bitcoin and solana this year, as exchange-traded funds investing in the se...

item.title: China Needs More Factory Robots. Can It Build Its Own?
item.description: Local production of industrial robots is rising, but Japanese and European makers still have a role.

item.title: Will the election impact what happens with my taxes and the stock market?
item.description: Emotions can run high in an election year

item.title: Americans Are Really, Really Bullish on Stocks
item.description: The surging stock market has minted millionaires and helped send many Americans’ net worth sharply higher. Many are betting that the rally has more ro...

item.title: Turning 44 or 60? Here’s why you might really be feeling your age this time.
item.description: Aging spikes dramatically at two points in life, research says. Here’s what you can do about it.

item.title: Japan Bank Shares Rise as 10-Year JGB Yield Hits Nearly One-Month High
item.description: Japanese bank stocks rose as the yield on the 10-year Japanese government bonds touched near a one-month high.

item.title: Why is the stock market down? Manufacturing data reminded investors that bad news is bad news.

item.title: Stock Futures Are Little Changed as Investors Await Jobs Report Later This Week
item.description: U.S. stock and bond markets were closed for Labor Day. Germany’s DAX index closed at a record high.

item.title: Southwest Airlines’ stock rises after activist investor Elliott ups its stake
item.description: The private-equity firm now holds enough stock to call a special shareholder meeting ahead of a Sept. 9 sit-down with the airline’s management.
